Pr\u00e9requis: Etre inscrit au Mastère Spécialisé "Infrastructure Project Finance"
Objectifs du module: To give participants an understanding of fundamental features of project finance and outline the role of the lawyer during the negotiation phase in project financing and identify the various actors involved in PPPs.
Programme du module: Interactive method. - the players (companies/sponsors; funds; banks) - investors, lenders and lawyers - selection of the lenders' lawyers - contracts in project financing (SHA/SPA, financial contracts, concession) - public and private law and the different specificities: financial/corporate law and concession law - content of a SHA (governance / liquidity) - consortium agreement - Investors in equity (industrial and funds), their respective interests and capital stability clauses - greenfield projects and brownfield projects - project financing / corporate financing - the different types of contracts (DSP/PPP) - the different sectors (payment by users / taxpayers) - the different types of risk and accounting translation - "force majeure" - termination (sanctions / general interest) - State aid and public procurement - prior evaluation / unsolicited offers
